dt-api.name: rows().every()
dt-api.summary: Iterate over each selected row, with the function context set to be the row in question.

type.parameter:
Function to execute for every row selected. The function's content is set to be an API instance for the row in question.
As of DataTables 1.10.8 the function is passed the following parameters:
1. Row index 2. Table loop counter 3. Row loop counter 4. Undefined (present only for consistency)
No return value is expected or acted upon.
type.returns: DataTables API instance of the selected rows.

example.title: Add a child row to all rows, passing in a jQuery created `dt-tag tr` element and show all child rows
Update all rows in the table, redrawing only when complete
